response_parsed.title: Packaging Microservices using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to package and distribute FastAPI microservices in Python 3.12+. We will cover the essential steps including project setup, creating a Uvicorn ASGI application, building an image, and deploying the microservice.

Build Docker image with the microservice
caveats: Always ensure to test your microservices locally before deploying
Use the appropriate Dockerfile and deployment configuration for your environment
